newsitems.title: BlapBash 2022
newsitems.contents: The avocados are going on vacation this year! BlapBash is officially back for 2022 raising money for SpecialEffect to put fun and inclusion back into the lives of people with physical disabilities by helping them to play video games! The two-day livestream event will take place on July 30th and 31...
